text: if not vim.loop.fs stat(lazypath) then vim.fn.system({ "git", "clone", "--filter=blob:none", "https://github.com/folke/lazy.nvim.git", "--branch=stable", -- latest stable release lazypath, Not Committed Yet b end vim.opt.rtp:prepend(lazypath) local plugins = { | { "nvim-lua/plenary.nvim", module = "plenary" }, )
